${ModID}:DanceTransition.NAME: Explosive Finish
${ModID}:DanceTransition.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Dancing. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, then discard your hand. NL Deal !M! more for each card discarded.

${ModID}:ElectricSlide.NAME: Electric Slide
${ModID}:ElectricSlide.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Dancing NL Discard up to !M! cards. NL Gain !B! Block per card discarded. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Draw a card.

${ModID}:FastMovements.NAME: Fast Movements
${ModID}:FastMovements.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Vigor for each card discarded or played last turn.

${ModID}:FunkyChicken.NAME: Funky Chicken
${ModID}:FunkyChicken.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard a card. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards.

${ModID}:InTheRhythm.NAME: In The Rhythm
${ModID}:InTheRhythm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard !${ModID}:m2! cards, gain !M! Strength and 3 Temporary Hp.
${ModID}:InTheRhythm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you discard !${ModID}:m2! cards, gain !M! Strength and 3 Temporary Hp.

${ModID}:PointMove.NAME: Point Move
${ModID}:PointMove.DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck, then draw a card. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Gain !M! [E] .

${ModID}:TheBump.NAME: The Bump
${ModID}:TheBump.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:TheBusStop.NAME: The Bus Stop
${ModID}:TheBusStop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard a card. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:TheRobot.NAME: The Robot
${ModID}:TheRobot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Until next turn, whenever you discard a card gain !M! Block. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:YMCA.NAME: YMCA
${ModID}:YMCA.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Dancing. NL Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:m2! times. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Attacks 1 more time until played.
${ModID}:YMCA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Dancing. Retain. NL Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:m2! times. NL ${ModID}:Smooth: Attacks 1 more time until played.
